thread.title: Outstanding service at this gem of a hotel.
thread.title_full: Outstanding service at this gem of a hotel. - Review of Hotel Regent's Garden, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mary G
title: Outstanding service at this gem of a hotel.
text:
We have stayed at this hotel for many years and the level of service and quality of accommodation get better every year! The location is very convenient, the private garden an absolute delight and the staff are, without exception, helpful, polite and professional.
Room Tip: Best rooms overlook the garden. See more room tips
